entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 a.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.9Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain after midnight. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
